name: Next Server Theme
description: New theming lib for Next with no rehydration
author: Reddit - r/nextjs

name: Understanding Vercel Functions
description: Vercel Functions run code in response to user traffic without the need to manage your own infrastructure, provision servers, or manage hardware.
author: Lee Robinson - Vercel

name: Security advice for self-hosting Next.js in Docker
description: Learn how to improve the security of your self-hosted Next.js applications. This guide covers Docker container image best practices, secret management, vulnerability mitigation, and more, so your Next.js projects are better protected from threats.
author: DAVID MYTTON - Arcjet

name: Protect your app the professional way
description: Next.js Auth with Roles & Permissions (RBAC / Authorization)
author: ByteGrad

name: Rate Limiting in NextJs with Middleware, Vercel KV Storage & Upstash
description: we'll look at rate limiting your NextJs application using edge middleware functions, Vercel KV (Kay value storage), and the Upstash rate limiting package.
author: Hamed Bahram

name: Caching in NextJs ft Delba Oliveira from Vercel
description: Caching in NextJs with Delba Oliveira, developer advocate at Vercel, and the beautiful mind behind NextJs documentation.
author: Hamed Bahram

name: NextJS 'use server' Trap (Accidentally Leaking Data)
description: If you care about security for your NextJS app, stop using top level 'use server' - it's way too easy to leak data
author: Jolly Coding
